about_the_game:
Take on the role of Johann, a young man who is forced to flee his war-torn village in Rovania. The journey will take you on an epic adventure through the mysterious Zwarthout region, where supernatural sightings are common and dangers lurk around every corner.

While exploring the Zwarthout region, you'll encounter various obstacles that can only be overcome by solving puzzles and using strategy. The puzzles are designed to challenge your problem-solving skills and provide an immersive gameplay experience. Additionally, you'll engage in swordplay, make sudden choices critical to your survival and wield magic to defeat the horrific monstrosities that lurk in the area.

The game's mechanics offer an engaging RPG experience that will keep players hooked for hours. You'll be able to wield and improve different weapons, use a detailed inventory system, build traps, concoct potions, improve skills, and discover new spells to aid you in your journey. Trap building will form an important part of the game to kill monsters that are much more powerful than you and will require wit rather than brute force to overcome. The game's narrative also offers multiple branching story-lines and choices that can affect the outcome of the game.

Overall, The Chronicles of Rovania: Darkest Bridge is a captivating RPG that combines elements of adventure, puzzle-solving, and combat to create an immersive gameplay experience. Step into a rich medieval fantasy world filled with an abundance of mystery and horror.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains scenes of violence, gore, drugs and frequent horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, HDD Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Venture into a dark and terrifying world with Johann, fleeing from a war-torn region in the kingdom of Rovania. This captivating RPG features spine-chilling monsters, challenging quests, and intense battles. Immerse yourself in its breathtaking graphics and prepare for an unforgettable adventure.
